message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity, and I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to start with a price of $12,000, which is a fair price considering its value to you.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. While I appreciate the product, $12,000 is a bit outside my budget. I'm willing to pay $8,500 for it, which is still a fair price considering its value to me.

I understand that $12,000 was a bit steep, but $8,500 is a bit low for me. I'm willing to meet you in the middle. I can offer it to you for $10,000, which is a fair price considering its value to me and the value it has to you.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to compromise. However, $10,000 is still a bit higher than I'm comfortable with. I'm willing to go up to $9,000, which reflects a fair price for both of us. I'm confident this is a good deal considering the value of the product.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob! I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer it to you for $9,500, which is a fair price considering the value it has to you and the value it has to me. I'm getting close to my minimum price, so I hope we can meet in the middle.

Alice,  I understand you're getting close to your minimum price, but $9,500 is still outside my budget. I'm willing to go up to $9,250, which I think is a good compromise. Let's seal this deal, and we can both be happy with the outcome.

I'm getting close to my minimum price, and I'm not willing to go any lower. I can offer it to you for $9,500, but I'll throw in a small concession: I'll include a one-year warranty, which is a $500 value. This way, you'll get an even better deal, and I'll still be able to get a good price for the product.
